org.codehaus.mojo.versions

Class SetScmTagMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • org.codehaus.mojo.versions.AbstractVersionsUpdaterMojo
        • org.codehaus.mojo.versions.SetScmTagMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo

    @Mojo(name="set-scm-tag",
      requiresDirectInvocation=true,
      aggregator=true)
public class SetScmTagMojo
extends AbstractVersionsUpdaterMojo
    Updates the current project's SCM tag.
    Since:
    2.5
    Author:
    Anton Johansson
